tool_description: Checks the availability status of one or more domain names across multiple TLDs and provides pricing information from various registrars.

domain_names.description: List of domain names to check (without TLD extensions)

tlds.description: List of top-level domains to check (.com, .org, .net, etc.)

include_premium.description: Whether to include premium domain suggestions

error_messages: Invalid domain name format: Domain names must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens, cannot start or end with hyphens.
Invalid TLD format: TLD must start with a dot and contain only valid characters (e.g., .com, .org).
Too many domains requested: Maximum 50 domain names can be checked in a single request.
Registrar API unavailable: One or more domain registrar services are temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide an array of domain names and TLD extensions to check. Set include_premium to true if you want premium domain suggestions. The tool returns availability status and pricing for each domain-TLD combination.

results.description: Array of domain availability results with status and pricing

premium_suggestions.description: Array of premium domain suggestions if requested
